data.name: myjinxin katas #005 : Age Of Wind
data.description:
## Description
In the age of big sailing, sea trade means wealth and adventure. If you have a ship that can sail in the sea and enough capital, you can begin your journey of wealth.

First select a destination. Then buy a large number of cheap goods locally, transported to the destination to sell, to obtain the maximum profits. Of course, as a businessman, returning with an empty ship is unforgivable. You must buy cheap goods at destination and spend all your money. Bring back the goods and sell them for the maximum profit.

This is the sea trade. What is the most important? First of all, you need to have enough `capital`:

```
capital=5000
```
OK, You have $5000. What is the second important? That is the `information`, you need to know what goods are shipped to the destination to get the maximum profit, and also need to know which goods are shipped back from the destination to get the maximum profit. 

```
//information1 is the local product information
information1=[
{name:"Leather",price:2,quantity:2000},
{name:"Wine",price:0.5,quantity:6000},
{name:"Spice",price:20,quantity:300},
{name:"Silk",price:15,quantity:1000}
]

//information2 is the destination product information
information2=[
{name:"Leather",price:6,quantity:200},
{name:"Wine",price:5,quantity:1000},
{name:"Spice",price:5,quantity:5000},
{name:"Silk",price:4,quantity:5000}
]

```
We choose our goods according to the information:

```
In the local, buy:

Wine (0.5) x 6000 = $3000
Leather(2) x 1000 = $2000

Transported to the destination, sold:

Wine (5)   x 6000 = $30000
Leather(6) x 1000 = $6000

Your $5000 became to $36000, nice profit ;-)
And you're going to spend all that money.

In the destination, buy:

Spice(5) x 5000 = $25000
Silk (4) x 2750 = $11000

Transported to the local, sold:

Spice(20) x 5000 = $100000
Silk (15) x 2750 = $41250

In the end, you get the profit:

$141250 - $5000 = $136250
```

## Task
Complete function `seaTrade` that accepts 3 arguments `capital` and `information1`, `information2`. Returns the final profit after your journey of wealth.

Note: If there is not enough goods for you to buy, you can only buy the maximum amount you can get and don't buy the goods that no profit. For example, it is a foolish idea to buy Spices from local to destination.

I'm not sure all random tests work properly, please help me to test it. Many thanks ;-)
